name: Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.
description: Provider of an eCommerce site and social media page created to share Japanese otaku culture products and news with the world. The company's eCommerce site and social media page work directly with manufactures and independent creators to provide an authentic and curated selection of merchandise and popular news, enabling Japanese pop culture fans to receive the latest in otaku culture.
